Package game.gamegui

This package is the visual representation of the game.

See: Description

    Camera

  • Enum Summary

    SelectionType
    What exactly on the selected Tile is actually selected? Created by flavia on 09.03.17.

Package game.gamegui Description

This package is the visual representation of the game. It is ignored by the server and only exists on the clients. All the input from mouse and keyboard during the game is received in this package. The game engine is then updated on the server which sends the update to all the clients' engine package, including this client. The communication to the server is handled via the game's GameController. Created by flavia on 27.03.17.
